english.segment1: We could watch you from afar. And forever be amazed. At how glorious you are. Yet you've drawn us close to you. Where the wonder's greater still. And you overwhelm us, God
english.segment2: And we rejoice with trembling in our hearts. Bring you a song of reverence and love. Jesus, how good, how great you are. And we rejoice with trembling. Before your throne
english.segment3: Who could fully voice the praise. Of the God of endless days. Tell a fraction of your worth?. For we only sing in part. Of the grace of who you are. Just an echo, just a glimpse
english.segment4: And we rejoice with trembling in our hearts. Bring you a song of reverence and love. Jesus, how good, how great you are. And we rejoice with trembling. Before your throne
